/* mngrGetJoinFormBySiteCode */
SELECT no, name, nickname, passtrycnt, phone, mobile, email, fax, address, birth, sex, grp, regmemid, updmemid, regdt, upddt, contractDesc, sitecode, use_joinwait FROM t_joinform WHERE sitecode=#{siteCode} ORDER BY no DESC
mapper.insert: /* mngrInsertJoinFormConfig */ INSERT INTO t_joinform( no, name, nickname, phone, mobile, email, fax, address, birth, sex, grp, regmemid, contractdesc, sitecode, use_joinwait ) VALUES( T_JOINFORM_SEQ.nextval, #{name}, #{nickName}, #{phone}, #{mobile}, #{email}, #{fax}, #{address}, #{birth}, #{sex}, #{grp}, #{regMemId}, #{contractDesc}, #{siteCode}, #{useJoinwait} )
mapper.update: /* mngrModifyJoinFormConfig */ UPDATE t_joinform SET name = #{name}, nickname = #{nickName}, phone = #{phone}, mobile = #{mobile}, email = #{email}, fax = #{fax}, address = #{address}, birth = #{birth}, sex = #{sex}, grp = #{grp}, updmemid = #{updMemId}, upddt = SYSDATE, contractDesc = #{contractDesc}, sitecode = #{siteCode}, use_joinwait = #{useJoinwait} WHERE no = #{no}
